author: lveldere
body:
Sync track id flag definitions with FullSim
A low statistics validation was performed,
and a much improved prediction of the track high purity criterium is observed.

FastSim cfg for track id is now imported from full tracking.

TrackProducers are imported from full tracker and edited only when needed for FastSim,
to better show the differences between FastSim and FullSim.

For the same reason, tracking collection names now follow full tracking convention.

One exception are the track seeds.
this will be fixed after merging of
https://github.com/lveldere/cmssw/compare/nSigmaZSelection
We also plan to change cfg file names to follow conventions of full tracking.

@VinInn @rovere
title: Fastsim Tracking: sync track id flag definitions with FullSim
